data.title: Peter Bakowski
data.meta_description: Peter Bakowski has been writing poetry exclusively for 32 years. On 2 February 2015, Editions Doucey of Paris published a bilingual edition of his Selected Poems entitled The Heart at 3am / Le coeur a trois heures du matin.
